mapper.insert: insert into `expaccountgrantrecord` (grantUserId, amount, grantDate, returnDate, grantType, note, state) values (#{grantUserId}, #{amount}, #{grantDate}, #{returnDate}, #{grantType}, #{note}, #{state})
mapper.update: update `expaccountgrantrecord` set grantUserId = #{grantUserId}, amount = #{amount}, grantDate = #{grantDate}, returnDate = #{returnDate}, grantType = #{grantType}, note = #{note}, state = #{state} where id = #{id}
